  `id_village_from` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `id_village_to` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `type` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `is_read` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '',
  `data` TEXT NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_report`)  COMMENT '',
  INDEX `FK___WORLD_NAME___report_id_user` (`id_user` ASC)  COMMENT '',
  UNIQUE INDEX `UNIQUE___WORLD_NAME___report_id_report` (`id_report` ASC)  COMMENT '',
  INDEX `FK___WORLD_NAME___report_village_id_village_from` (`id_village_from` ASC)  COMMENT '',
  INDEX `FK___WORLD_NAME___report_village_id_village_to` (`id_village_to` ASC)  COMMENT '',
  CONSTRAINT `FK___WORLD_NAME___report_user_id_user`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_user`)
    REFERENCES `twlan`.`__WORLD_NAME___user` (`id_user`)
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `FK___WORLD_NAME___report_village_id_village_from`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_village_from`)
    REFERENCES `twlan`.`__WORLD_NAME___village` (`id_village`)
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `FK___WORLD_NAME___report_village_id_village_to`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_village_to`)
    REFERENCES `twlan`.`__WORLD_NAME___village` (`id_village`)
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;

-- View `twlan`.`__WORLD_NAME___vevent_train`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `twlan`.`__WORLD_NAME___vevent_train`;
USE `twlan`;
CREATE  OR REPLACE SQL SECURITY INVOKER
VIEW `__WORLD_NAME___vevent_train` AS
    SELECT 
        wt.*,
        FLOOR((UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - we.start) / ((we.finish - we.start) / amount)) AS doneUnits
    FROM
        __WORLD_NAME___event_train wt
            INNER JOIN
        __WORLD_NAME___event we ON we.id_event = wt.id_event
;



SET SQL_MODE=@OLD_SQL_MODE;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS;
SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;
